long_description: Pull on the Manzella Power Stretch TouchTip(TM) gloves for toasty warmth while you surf the web and listen to tunes on your touch-screen smart phone or digital music player. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) provides 4-way stretch, making it ideal for skiing, cold-weather cycling and other active sports. TouchTip material on the thumbs and forefingers lets you operate a touch-screen device while wearing the gloves. Manzella Power Stretch TouchTip gloves have a grippy print on the palms.
short_description: Pull on the Manzella Power Stretch TouchTip(TM) gloves for toasty warmth while you surf the web and listen to tunes on your touch-screen smart phone or digital music player.
